scripts.sass: find  \( -path "*/src/*" -name "styles.scss" -o -path "*/src/*" -name "*.scss" \) | sort -nr | xargs -I{} sh -c "cat {}; echo ''" | sass --stdin dist/dmb-styles.css -s compressed --no-source-map --trace --no-quiet
scripts.sass-watch: find  \( -path "*/src/*" -name "styles.scss" -o -path "*/src/*" -name "*.scss" \) | sort -nr | xargs -I{} sh -c "cat {}; echo ''" | sass --stdin dist/dmb-styles.css -s compressed --no-source-map --watch
scripts.uglify-directives: find \( -path "./src/*" -name "*.directive.js" ! -name "*.spec.js" \) | xargs -I{} sh -c "cat {}; echo ''" | terser -o dist/dmb-components.min.js
scripts.uglify-factories: find \( -path "./src/*" -name "*.factory.js" ! -name "*.spec.js" \) | xargs -I{} sh -c "cat {}; echo ''" | terser -c -m -o dist/dmb-factories.min.js
scripts.build: npm run lint & npm run sass & npm run uglify-dumbo & npm run uglify-factories & npm run uglify-directives & npm run test
